entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
